description:
300 Pier 4 Blvd UNIT 8D, Boston, MA 02210 is a condo home that contains 2,247 sq ft and was built in 2017. It contains 3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. This home last sold for $7,000,000 in October 2024. 
 
The Zestimate for this house is $7,059,200. The Rent Zestimate for this home is $23,002/mo.

telephoneConsumerProtectionActDisclaimer.text: By pressing Contact agent, you agree that Zillow Group and its affiliates, and real estate professionals may call/text you about your inquiry, which may involve use of automated means and prerecorded/artificial voices. You don’t need to consent as a condition of buying any property, goods or services. Message/data rates may apply. You also agree to our Terms of Use. textAttributes.tooltipText: “Real estate professionals” includes the real estate agents and brokers, mortgage lenders and loan officers, property managers, and other professionals you interact with through Zillow.
